generated_body: The article likely discusses the recent decision by the Taliban to release two professors as part of a prisoner swap, detailing the context of their captivity and the implications of this exchange. The article may also explore how this development fits into ongoing negotiations or efforts concerning Afghanistan’s governance and security.
